snippet.title: ☆ TRANSFORMATIONS AND PARENT FUNCTIONS
snippet.description:
Join us on this flipped math lesson where we visually explore the parent functions, their domain and range, and we can perform transformations on them. For more MashUp Math content, visit http://www.mashupmath.com and join our free mailing list! :)

Get the PDF Lesson Guide Here: http://mashupmath.com/resources/

This lesson answers the questions: What is a parent function? What is domain? What is range? How do I transform a function? How do I shift a function? How do I find the domain of a function? How do I find the range of a function?

Our lessons are perfect for flipped classroom math teachers and students. This lesson is aligned with the common core learning standards for math and the SAT math curriculum as well.

Be sure to join our mailing list at http://www.mashupmath.com
